sentences.en: A larva of several tortricid moths, especially the spruce budworm , that devours plant buds.
sentences.cn: 一些卷叶蛾的幼虫，尤指云杉芽虫，吞食植物的幼芽。

sentences.en: As to different host plants, HJS strain preferred to oviposit in the host eggs on pepper, but tobacco budworm preferred to oviposit on tobacco.
sentences.cn: HJS对辣椒上烟青虫卵的寄生选择系数较高，而烟青虫偏好产卵于烟草。

sentences.en: Effect on the controlling oriental tobacco budworm , Helicoverpa assulta by using sex pheromone.
sentences.cn: 与用性信息素诱剂防治烟青虫的效果>>相似的文献。

sentences.en: Effect on the controlling oriental tobacco budworm, Helicoverpa assulta by using sex pheromone.
sentences.cn: 与用性信息素诱剂防治烟青虫的效果>>相似的文献.

sentences.en: Is tomato plant the host of the oriental tobacco budworm, Helicoverpa assulta ( Guen é e )?
sentences.cn: 番茄是烟青虫的 寄主 植物 吗 ?

sentences.en: It has obvious killing effect on budworm, scale insect, caterpillar, leaf rollers, etc. and has no environmental pollution and is safe to human body and farm animal.
sentences.cn: 对食心虫、介壳虫、星毛虫、卷叶虫、菜青虫、木虱、螨类具有以菌杀虫的显著效果，且对环境无污染，对人畜安全；

trans.tran_cn: 任何对苞芽有害的幼虫，芽虫
